title: NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Junior Consultant Engineer Post
description: National Ayush Mission Kerala (NAM Kerala) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Consultant Engineer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech in Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible aspirants can attend the walk-in at...
